rows.text:
{{sortname|"The American Dream" Dusty|Rhodes|Dusty Rhodes (wrestler)}}
({{small|Virgil Runnels Jr.}})

Three-time NWA World Heavyweight Champion, one-time NWA United States Heavyweight Champion, two-time NWA World Tag Team Champion, two-time NWA World Six-Tag Team Champion, and three-time NWA World Television Champion. Long-time lead booker for WCW

Posthumous inductee: Represented by his widow Leonice, his four children, his mother and his father Larry "The Axe" Hennig.
One-time AWA World Heavyweight Champion, two-time WWF Intercontinental Heavyweight Champion, one-time WCW United States Heavyweight Champion, one-time WCW World Tag Team Champion
One-time AWA World Heavyweight Champion, 35-time AWA Southern Heavyweight Champion, three-time WCCW World Heavyweight Champion, 28-time USWA Unified Champion and longtime color commentator for WWE
Four-time AWA World Heavyweight Champion and three-time AWA World Tag Team Champion
Five-time WWWF/WWF World Tag Team Champion. Former manager

Posthumous inductee: Represented by his widow Joyce Farhat.
Also known as "The Original Sheik", a two-time WWWF United States Heavyweight Champion, held over 20 NWA regional championships
Longtime lead announcer for WWF/E, WCW and other regional promotions; Head of WWF Talent Relations during the Attitude Era, signing many well known wrestlers
